mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.total_commission AS "totalCommission", a.pay_total AS "payTotal", a.img_url AS "imgUrl", a.deadline AS "deadline", a.pay_time AS "payTime", a.remark AS "remark", a.biz_status AS "bizStatus", a.seller_id AS "sellerId", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.status AS "delFlag", process.id AS "commonProcess.id", process.object_id AS "commonProcess.objectId", process.object_name AS "commonProcess.objectName", process.prev_id AS "commonProcess.prevId", process.biz_status AS "commonProcess.bizStatus", process.processor AS "commonProcess.processor", process.description AS "commonProcess.description", process.type AS "commonProcess.type", process.create_time AS "commonProcess.createTime", so.id AS "customer.id", so.name AS "customer.name", bci.id AS "customerInfo.id", bci.office_id AS "customerInfo.officeId", bci.bank_name AS "customerInfo.bankName", bci.card_number AS "customerInfo.cardNumber", bci.payee AS "customerInfo.payee", bci.remark AS "customerInfo.remark", bci.apply_for_level AS "customerInfo.applyForLevel"

LEFT JOIN common_process process ON process.object_id = a.id and process.object_name = 'biz_commission' and process.current = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_office so ON so.id = a.seller_id LEFT JOIN biz_customer_info bci ON bci.office_id = so.id
mapper.select: select a.id AS "id", a.object_name AS "objectName", a.object_id AS "objectId", a.img_type AS "imgType", a.img_sort AS "imgSort", a.img_server AS "imgServer", a.img_path AS "imgPath", a.img_link AS "imgLink", a.comment AS "comment", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate" from common_img a where a.object_id = #{id} and a.object_name = 'biz_commission'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO biz_commission( id, total_commission, pay_total, img_url, deadline, pay_time,
remark,
biz_status, seller_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{totalCommission}, #{payTotal}, #{imgUrl}, #{deadline}, #{payTime},
#{remark},
#{bizStatus}, #{sellerId} )
